statements: SELECT * FROM shift_schedule;
SELECT employee_id, shift_date, location FROM shift_schedule WHERE shift_start_time < '09:00:00';
SELECT * FROM shift_schedule WHERE shift_date = '2022-09-30' AND location = 'Office';
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM shift_schedule ORDER BY shift_date ASC, shift_start_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM shift_schedule WHERE is_remote = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM shift_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT id, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM shift_schedule WHERE location = 'Office' ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT id, employee_id, shift_date FROM shift_schedule WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND is_remote = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM shift_schedule WHERE location LIKE '%North%';
SELECT id, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM shift_schedule WHERE is_remote = FALSE ORDER BY shift_date ASC, shift_start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_id = 1;
SELECT shift_id, shift_date, shift_start_time FROM shifts ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT shift_id, employee_id, shift_date FROM shifts WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_date, assignment_details FROM work_assignments WHERE is_remote = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM work_assignments WHERE assignment_id > 5 ORDER BY assignment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT shift_id, shift_date FROM shifts WHERE shift_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM work_assignments WHERE is_remote = TRUE;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_date, assignment_details FROM work_assignments WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT employee_id, assignment_date FROM work_assignments WHERE assignment_details LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM ShiftChanges;
SELECT shift_date, employee_id, new_shift_start_time FROM ShiftChanges ORDER BY shift_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, new_shift_end_time FROM ShiftChanges WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT assignment_date, location FROM RemoteWorkAssignments WHERE location = 'Remote Office';
SELECT employee_id, department FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM ShiftChanges WHERE shift_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_name, position FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC
SELECT shift_id, employee_id, new_shift_start_time FROM ShiftChanges WHERE new_shift_start_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00'
SELECT location, assignment_date FROM RemoteWorkAssignments WHERE location = 'Home' AND assignment_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND remote_work_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM shift_schedule;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employee_profile WHERE employee_department = 'IT';
SELECT shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM shift_schedule ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM employee_profile WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT assignment_type, assignment_date, is_completed FROM work_assignments WHERE is_completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM shift_schedule;
SELECT employee_id, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM shift_schedule WHERE shift_location = 'Main Office';
SELECT employee_name, employee_email, employee_department FROM employee_profile ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_type, assignment_date, is_completed FROM work_assignments WHERE assignment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT request_id, request_reason, request_date FROM remote_work_requests WHERE request_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY request_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, shift_role_id FROM employees WHERE shift_role_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT shift_id, shift_date FROM shifts WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM shift_roles WHERE role_name = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, shift_id FROM employees INNER JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM shift_roles;
SELECT employee_name, role_name FROM employees JOIN shift_roles ON employees.shift_role_id = shift_roles.role_id;
SELECT shift_date, employee_name FROM shifts JOIN employees ON shifts.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT change_date, new_employee_id FROM shifts_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_assignments WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-12-31';
